amendment.description: Amendment sought to modify the bill's required study by the Housing and Urban Development Department on the FHA Refinance Program's use by, and effects on, certain homeowners to include a study on the need and appropriate guidelines for a replacement mortgage insurance program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to modify the bill's required study by the Housing and Urban Development Department on the FHA Refinance Program's use by, and effects on, certain homeowners to include a study on the need and appropriate guidelines for a replacement mortgage insurance program.

action.text: Mrs. Biggert raised a point of order against the Inslee amendment (A005). Mrs. Biggert stated that the amendment was not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
